description: White Rocks is full of a mix of hiking, moutain biking, snowshoe and ATV trails.  You can walk in here for days.  This trail starts with a quick decent and then on to a steady climb up a trail commonly used for mountain biking.
directions: Head to Hillsborough, turn up Golfclub Rd., take the first right and follow to until you see the trail head on the left
title: White Rocks Trail System
